short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that lets you replace the images on property websites with AI-generated styles.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your perfect home might be hiding behind someone else's questionable design choices. StyleShift helps you see past the dated decor to visualize your future space.

Our Chrome extension instantly transforms room photos from your favourite property websites, helping you imagine the space with different styles and designs. Perfect for house hunting, projects and investments, or just dreaming of your ideal living space.

When you're on popular UK property websites, you'll see several extra buttons near the photo. Each button generates a different style for the room you're looking at.

You get a handful of free style generations before you'll need to pay for further access. Styleshift can save on expensive designers, and help unlock the potential in so many properties.
